column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Ive been here a few times
column2: you definately need to be a fan of tapas to enjoy this place.  I really only go here on special occassion
column3: but im always satisfied.  MAKE A RESERVATION if you plan on eating dinner here for a date or group.  Or hope to find a spot at the bar which i enjoy just as much....less people there.  They have a massive patio that i am determined to enjoy one of these nights...looks like the place to be
